FieldSecurityClassification.name: FieldSecurityClassification
FieldSecurityClassification.description: Represents a field’s data sensitivity value selected from the SecurityClassification picklist.

ApiName.description: The API name of the data sensitivity picklist value. Default values: Public Internal Confidential Restricted MissionCritical

Description.description: The description of the data sensitivity picklist value.

IsHighRiskLevel.description: Indicates that fields with this picklist value contain data highly sensitive to your company.

MasterLabel.description: The data sensitivity picklist value. Default values: Public Internal Confidential Restricted MissionCritical

SortOrder.description: The value’s position in the picklist.
